name: Bone Collector
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.

legacy.otherNightReminder: If the Bone Collector has not used their ability: The Bone Collector either shows a 'no' head shake or points to a dead player. That player regains their ability until dusk.

otherNights.description: Once per game, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.

information.customMessage: Choose a dead player to regain their ability until dusk.
